Windlord/Talon

Windlord mount out and walked slowly in the place, it was s=
o... peaceful. It started to calm down his rage.


************************=
***********

Talon smiled and walked towards Tucson quarters.


From: Sandy=
 Panico 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2011 7:30 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
S=
ubject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




Quickstride l=
ooks behind himself to be sure that Windlord was on his back.  After assuri=
ng himself that he was, he slowly turns around and strolls off toward the h=
appy place he had discovered.   Eventually he comes to a wooded path, throu=
gh what appear to be large conifer trees mixed in with several deciduous tr=
ee varieties.  The deeper he went, the more tranquil it becomes, until a so=
ft babbling could be heard, as he gets close to a clear water stream.  Rive=
r rocks dapple the stream's edge as various birds chirp their peaceful melo=
dies.

"And here we are.  Couldn't get any more peaceful than this.  This i=
s where I come ta get away from it all."

Back at the base, Tucson slips in=
 a text message to Talon.


" Meet me at my quarters.  I won't be long with=
 Wheelie."
Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 5, 2011, a=
t 7:36 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


    
  Wind=
lord/Talon/Perceptor:::

  Windlord sighed again and mount up, he didnt lik=
ed to be rude but it was better than be comsumed by rage.

  **************=
***********************

  Talon smiled and she walked towards the medic ba=
y, waitting Tucson to come back to CR.

  *********************************=
*******

  Perceptor opned his comlink in Maximal frecuency to Rodimus and =
the others maximals and said =E2=80=9CHey, any one there? =E2=80=9D


  Fro=
m: Sandy Panico 
  Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2011 7:33 AM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
  Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)



=

  Quickstride knew his friend needed someone with him who could offer mora=
l support.  He takes a seat with Windlord and looks to him in a friendly ma=
nner.

  " I know something that might help get your mind off things for a =
while.  Things have settled down for a little while so I think it's okay if=
 we venture out for a bit .  There's a place I found one day while grazing =
outside, and I never saw anything as extraordinary as what I saw when I wal=
ked in.  "

  He gets back into beast mode and offers his back to Windlord.=


  " mount up, I'll take you there right now.  Trust me, it's so worth the=
 ride out there.  And I'm not gonna spoil the surprise."

  In the room, Tu=
cson gives Talon a gentile smile and a loving arm around her shoulder.  Gon=
e is the sign of bad temperament as he focuses his attention on her.  A tin=
y air of friskiness comes over him as he gently pulls Talon into his embrac=
e.

  " You're absolutely right, Talon.  It's a shame the CR chambers aren'=
t designed to fit two individuals together.  Which reminds me..  I still ow=
e you something don't I?"

  His mind was clearly on something else now as =
a playful look comes over his faceplate.  If anyone could bring him out of =
a bad mood, it was Talon.  Now somewhat cured of his temper he now remember=
s something else of great importance.  He still had to meet with Wheelie.  =
But now that he was in a better mood, he could converse with him in a more =
sane manner.

  " Ah, I forgot, I have to meet with Wheelie first.  I asked=
 Uproar to escort him to my quarters but, I'm sure Wheelie had other ideas.=
  I better go rescue Uproar from extreme exhaustion, no doubt Wheelie is we=
aring him out somewhere in the base."

  He gives Talon a kiss on her cheek=
 and a last minute hug.

  " I won't take long I promise.  Then it's to the=
 CR chamber."

  He then turns to head towards his quarters.  From a far he=
 can hear Uproar choking on a rather large hairball and he's quick to follo=
w the sound.

  " Uproar, are you alright?"

  Uproar gags but manages to s=
ay something.

  " Hairball.  Need help getting it out."

  Tucson cocks hi=
s head.

  " hmm?  What exactly is a hairball?"

  Uproar looks to him in d=
esperation.

  "please just help me okay?!"

  Tucson nods.

  "What do you=
  need?"

  Uproar looks up.

  " Whack me on the back real hard. That usua=
lly gets the hairballs out"

  Tucson hesitates for a moment and then with =
a firm but careful slap on Uproar's back, the hairball gets expelled.  A lo=
ok of relief floods the cat's face.

  "ah, much better. Thanks Sir, I need=
ed that."

  Tucson smiles and tries to listen for wheelie.

  " I take it =
Wheelie took off on you.  Don't worry, my fault for not warning you about h=
im.  All right, I'll go find him."

  He leaves Uproar who now heaves a lar=
ge sigh of relief.



  Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

  On=
 Jul 5, 2011, at 3:22 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote=
:


      
    Windlord/Talon:

    Windlord sighed and sit down in a corde=
r.

    *******************************

    Talon walked towards Tucson an=
d she carfully set one of her hands in his shoulder, trying to not hurt him=
 =E2=80=9CYou should come back to Cr, you need it=E2=80=9D.

    From: Sand=
y Panico 
    Sent: Monday, July 04, 2011 9:42 PM
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
    Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




 =
   Quickstride gives Windlord a soft pat on the back in sympathy.  He reali=
zes the stress that Hydras had put on everyone, including those most effect=
ed by the shell program.

    "what hydras did to you and the others was un=
speakable.  But look, there is a bright side, if it weren't for Tucson none=
 of us would have ever seen any of you again.  And for the first time in a =
long time, we're finally giving Hydras what he deserves.  So yeah what Hydr=
as did was really bad but, Tucson isn't abou to let him get away with it.  =
And to think he wants another one on one with Hydras.  I saw a huge dent on=
 his shoulder, looked like something that hasn't quite healed yet..  I don'=
t think he's taking the proper time in the CR chamber."

    Inside the roo=
m, Tucson begins to show signs of fatigue and puts his hand over his forehe=
ad.  He knew he wasn't taking the proper time to repair and recharge proper=
ly, due to the fact that he was assisting others before helping himself.  
=

    He turns his head to Leo Prime.

    " Nemesis...  Leo Prime, the ship=
, it could be Decepticon property.,,   I vote we remain cautious at all tim=
es." 



    Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

    On Jul 4, 2=
011, at 10:04 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


    =
    
      Windlord:

      Windlord sighed and shooked his head in disbeli=
ef.

      From: Sandy Panico 
      Sent: Sunday, July 03, 2011 9:24 PM
  =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All=
 Maximals & Autobots)




      Quickstride gives a sheepish smile to Windl=
ord.

      " Same here but, visualizing some place peaceful isn't so hard.=
  I'd have to imagine that for you, being sky bound is sort of your sanctua=
ry.  For me it's a quiet, open meadow teaming with sweet patches of green g=
rass, eating to my spark's content.  So much so that I can actually smell i=
t.  Just think of the scent of clean air and how the pockets of wind playfu=
lly carry you in their path.   Free as a bird, just give it a whirl."

    =
  Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

      On Jul 3, 2011, at 9=
:57 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


          
   =
     Windlord:

        =E2=80=9CMeditation isnt my best skill=E2=80=9Dsaid=
 Windlord

        From: Sandy Panico 
        Sent: Friday, July 01, 2011 =
4:26 PM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Subject: Re: Changing t=
imes (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




        Quickstride looks to both W=
indlord and Rodimus and then heaves a sigh. He knew of one individual who c=
ould have possibly helped everyone in this situation.  One that could teach=
 everyone how to clear their minds.  The same mech who also trained Prowl, =
Tucson, Straight Shot and Nightshift.  

        "Master Yokitron would def=
initely have been a big help ta all of us.  He often trained distressed war=
riors as yourselves how ta clear one's mind to purge it of impure thoughts =
that may overcome them.  He did that through meditation.  Surrounding one's=
 soul with a peaceful environment where one could find inner peace.  That's=
 what everyone needs, inner peace."

        He smiles to Rodimus, Windlord=
 and Lord Elder, who he just happens to notice.  

        " Ah, Lord Elder=
, please join us.  I was just telling these guys about Master Yokitron and =
how he used ta help troubled mechs through meditation.  I think we could al=
l use a little bit of that, huh?"

        Perpetually on the move and cons=
tantly busy. 

        On Jul 1, 2011, at 2:00 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <air=
ly2002@...> wrote:


            
          Windlord:

          Wi=
ndlord looked at Rodimus and Quickstride and said =E2=80=9CIt=E2=80=99s con=
suming me, and i dont like to become what Hydras attemped to do with us... =
I dont know what to do to make it stop... I need help but I dont know at wh=
om ask it, my only purpose now is retribution but I dont like that it consu=
me what remains of my old self=E2=80=9D

          From: Sandy Panico 
    =
      Sent: Friday, July 01, 2011 12:05 PM
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
          Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)
=




          Quickstride puts a friendly arm around Windlord with a gentil=
e look on his face.

          " I definitely know how ya feel.  There's ti=
mes when it was okay ta smash someone's snout in with a good, swift kick of=
 my hind hooves, but not now.  But things have a way of working out on thei=
r own.  Some call it karma.  What they do ta others, eventually comes back =
ta them.  And all we need ta do is sit back and let that happen.  Hydras is=
 gonna get it big time.  I see it in Tucson Prime's face.  He means busines=
s and he won't give up till that miserable lizard is dealt with accordingly=
.  "

          Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

          On=
 Jul 1, 2011, at 2:26 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote=
:


              
            Windlord:

            =E2=80=9CI=E2=80=99m =
Really mad at Predacons what they have done us...  And mad at myself for al=
l the  troubles that I tried to create for Rodimus and Nighlight, But the w=
orse of all is... I ENJOYED  TO DO ALL THAT CHAOS!! =E2=80=9Dsaid Windlord =
almost with despair =E2=80=9CThe sensasion to act without balance and resta=
in was... overhelming... And now it=E2=80=99s hard to for me to keep it in =
check...  But I want to do something usefull with my rage and give the Pred=
s a payback=E2=80=9D


            From: Sandy Panico 
            Sent: Th=
ursday, June 30, 2011 5:53 PM
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
     =
       Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)




     =
       Quickstride sighs, transforms and puts a hand on his shoulder.

    =
        " It's okay ta be frustrated.  Things are really nuts around here a=
nd tensions are at an all time high.  Even I'm gett'n effected by stress.  =
Well.. Put it this way, better ta have some ventilation when I'm around the=
se days.  Any way, if something bothers ya it's better ta talk about it tha=
n keeping it inside.  Besides I got all day."

            Perpetually on t=
he move and constantly busy. 

            On Jun 30, 2011, at 4:56 PM, Air=
shadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:


                
        =
      Windlord:

              "No"sighed the male while he looked at Quick=
stride "I'm not"

              -----Original Message----- 
              F=
rom: Super Cyclonus
              Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2011 11:02 AM
  =
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
              Subject: Re: Changing =
times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)

              > <OLD>
              >=

              > Windlord headed towards the MEdic bay and for a while watc=
hed without been
              > seen Nightligh and her daughter spent time=
 together and after few minutes 
              > he
              > headed =
towards the the training room.

              <NEW>

              LORD ELD=
ER stood in the doorway of the training room for a moment
              wat=
ching WINDLORD, his optics dark and thoughtful, as if wondering
           =
   what was going on in the mind of this maximal. There were dark corners
 =
             to him, and he was not sure what it portended to.

           =
   > <OLD>
              >
              > With permission granted, Quickst=
ride transforms into beast mode and trots
              > off to find Windl=
ord. He trots by the med bay then perks his ears up,
              > follow=
ing the source of Windlord's footsteps until he clip clops into the
       =
       > training room.
              >
              > "Windlord, are you =
okay?"

              <NEW>

              Sliding out of the way for a mom=
ent he watched as QUICKSTRIDE
              interacted with WINDLORD, looki=
ng for cues and clues that would help
              him to understand him. =
Perhaps it would be revealed in their
              conversation.

        =
      (TAG)

              Preston

  <D=
IV>Quickstride knew his friend needed someone with him who could offer mora=
l 
  support.  He takes a seat with Windlord and looks to him in a fri=
endly 
  manner.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" I know something that m=
ight help get your mind off things for a 
  while.  Things have settle=
d down for a little while so I think it's okay 
  if we venture out for a b=
it .  There's a place I found one day while 
  grazing outside, and I =
never saw anything as extraordinary as what I saw when 
  I walked in.&nbsp=
; "</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>He gets back into beast mode and offer=
s his back to Windlord.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" mount up, I'll t=
ake you there right now.  Trust me, it's so worth 
  the ride out ther=
e.  And I'm not gonna spoil the surprise."</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
 =
 <DIV>In the room, Tucson gives Talon a gentile smile and a loving arm arou=
nd 
  her shoulder.  Gone is the sign of bad temperament as he focuses=
 his 
  attention on her.  A tiny air of friskiness comes over him as =
he gently 
  pulls Talon into his embrace.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV=
>" You're absolutely right, Talon.  It's a shame the CR chambers 
  ar=
en't designed to fit two individuals together.  Which reminds 
  me..&=
nbsp; I still owe you something don't I?"</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>=
His mind was clearly on something else now as a playful look comes over 
  =
his faceplate.  If anyone could bring him out of a bad mood, it was 
 =
 Talon.  Now somewhat cured of his temper he now remembers something e=
lse 
  of great importance.  He still had to meet with Wheelie.  =
But now 
  that he was in a better mood, he could converse with him in a mo=
re sane 
  manner.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" Ah, I forgot, I have =
to meet with Wheelie first.  I asked Uproar 
  to escort him to my qua=
rters but, I'm sure Wheelie had other ideas.  I 
  better go rescue Up=
roar from extreme exhaustion, no doubt Wheelie is wearing 
  him out somewh=
ere in the base."</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>He gives Talon a kiss on=
 her cheek and a last minute hug.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" I won'=
t take long I promise.  Then it's to the CR chamber."</DIV>
  <DIV>&nb=
sp;</DIV>
  <DIV>He then turns to head towards his quarters.  From a f=
ar he can hear 
  Uproar choking on a rather large hairball and he's quick =
to follow the 
  sound.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" Uproar, are you =
alright?"</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>Uproar gags but manages to say s=
omething.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" Hairball.  Need help gett=
ing it out."</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>Tucson cocks his head.</DIV>
=
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" hmm?  What exactly is a hairball?"</DIV>
=
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>Uproar looks to him in desperation.</DIV>
  <DIV=
> </DIV>
  <DIV>"please just help me okay?!"</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>=

  <DIV>Tucson nods.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>"What do you  ne=
ed?"</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>Uproar looks up.</DIV>
  <DIV> <=
/DIV>
  <DIV>" Whack me on the back real hard. That usually gets the hairba=
lls 
  out"</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>Tucson hesitates for a moment =
and then with a firm but careful slap on 
  Uproar's back, the hairball get=
s expelled.  A look of relief floods the 
  cat's face.</DIV>
  <DIV>&=
nbsp;</DIV>
  <DIV>"ah, much better. Thanks Sir, I needed that."</DIV>
  <D=
IV> </DIV>
  <DIV>Tucson smiles and tries to listen for wheelie.</DIV>=

  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>" I take it Wheelie took off on you.  Don'=
t worry, my fault for not 
  warning you about him.  All right, I'll g=
o find him."</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV>He leaves Uproar who now heav=
es a large sigh of relief.</DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>
  <DIV> </DIV>

ickstride gives Windlord a soft pat on the back in sympathy.  He

egins to show signs of fatigue and puts his

 Prime.</DIV>

rrounding one's soul

ind inner peace.
